title.narrative: Empowering Individuals in India to Create a Brighter Future (LittleBigHelp COVID-19 Emergency Pool)

description.narrative: COVID-19 Compensation for LittleBigHelp for their activities in India, which they have not been able to raise funds for in 2020 due to COVID-19 restrictions. The activities are now in danger of shutting down. The grant is under Nødpuljen til lukningstruede aktiviteter i udviklingslandene.

Empowering individuals in India to create a brighter future in India - LittleBigHelp
The goal of the development project is to empower vulnerable women and children financially and socially and empowering them for a brighter future. The grant is given to the organisation due to their application to the COVID-19 Emergency Pool (Nødpulje) in order for the organisation to continue their skills development activities in India. Due to COVID-19 restrictions, planned development activities is in risk of closure, which would negatively affect results.
